question: What is the main objective of Pani Panchayat in Odisha?
option1: Optimum utilization of water as well as improving agricultural production
option3: Implementation of new river valley project
answer: Optimum utilization of water as well as improving agricultural production
explanation: Pani Panchayat was introduced in the year 2002. Its primary objective is to ensure optimum utilization of water as well as improving agricultural production.
